department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch:
2021-2030年是聯合國海洋永續發展的關鍵十年，本課程主要介紹遙感觀測海洋的機理及其在海洋學中的應用。海洋遙測是理解全球海洋系統的重要工具之一。本課程將藉由真實存在的海洋現象來讓同學了解海洋遙測的原理及資料的應用。同學在課程中可以同時認識海洋現象和基本的海洋性質。本課程包括基礎輻射物理學、海水表面溫度、紅外光與可見光遙感、海水表面鹽度與微波遙感、洋流與渦流、合成孔徑雷達和波浪、海面風場、行星波與大尺度海洋動力學、人類影響的大型海洋現象等。最後本課程有三週的MATLAB實作課程，讓同學們實際接觸到海洋衛星資料的處理與繪圖。

(本課程不限任何科系背景，歡迎大學部選修)
goal.en:
The United Nations has designated 2021-2030 as the Decade of Ocean Science for Sustainable Development. This course primarily introduces the mechanisms of remote sensing of the oceans and its applications in oceanography. Ocean remote sensing is one of the crucial tools for understanding the global ocean system. Through real marine phenomena, this course aims to help students grasp the principles of ocean remote sensing and the application of its data. Students will also become familiar with marine phenomena and basic ocean properties. The course includes fundamental radiative physics, sea surface temperatures, remote sensing with infrared and visible light, sea surface salinity and microwave remote sensing, ocean currents and eddies, synthetic aperture radar and waves, sea surface wind fields, planetary waves, and large-scale ocean dynamics, as well as human-impacted major marine phenomena. Lastly, the course features a three-week MATLAB workshop, allowing students hands-on experience with processing and plotting ocean satellite data. 

(This course does not require any specific departmental background and is open to all undergraduate students)

Week 3 (2024/09/25) 影像與海洋水色

Week 9 (2024/11/06) 合成孔徑雷達與波浪
Week 10 (2024/11/13) 海面風場, 湧升流

Week 12 (2024/11/27) MATLAB課程: 溫度與鹽度
Week 13 (2024/12/04)  APRS 2024 (停課)
Week 14 (2024/12/11) MATLAB課程: 海洋水色
